name: addons

params.name: -A, --all
params.desc: show add-ons and attachments for all accessible apps

params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: git remote of app to run command against

subcommands.name: addons:attach ADDON_NAME
subcommands.desc: attach add-on resource to an app

subcommands.name: addons:detach ATTACHMENT_NAME
subcommands.desc: detach add-on resource from an app

subcommands.name: addons:docs ADDON_NAME
subcommands.desc: open an add-on's documentation in your browser

subcommands.name: addons:downgrade ADDON_NAME ADDON_SERVICE:PLAN
subcommands.desc: downgrade an existing add-on resource to PLAN

subcommands.name: addons:info ADDON
subcommands.desc: Show info about an add-on and its attachments.

subcommands.name: addons:open ADDON_NAME
subcommands.desc: open an add-on's dashboard in your browser

subcommands.name: addons:plans SERVICE
subcommands.desc: list all available plans for an add-on service

subcommands.name: addons:upgrade ADDON_NAME ADDON_SERVICE:PLAN
subcommands.desc: upgrade an existing add-on resource to PLAN

subcommands.name: addons:wait ADDON
subcommands.desc: Show provisioning status of the add-ons on the app

examples: heroku addons:create heroku-postgresql --app my-app --name main-db --as PRIMARY_DB
